title: can't print cifar pixel image to console
body_html:
I was trying to print the x pixels values from pytorch and got a weird unicode error:

(Pdb) data_train[0]
*** UnicodeEncodeError: 'latin-1' codec can't encode character '\u22f1' in position 210: ordinal not in range(256)

only after I casted to numpy() did it print correctly. Shouldn't it be printing the floatTensor easily?

To reproduce the code just loop through cifar10 with trainloader and print the x feature pixels:

    for i,data_train in enumerate(trainloader):
          print(data_train[0]) # BUG

body:
I was trying to print the x pixels values from pytorch and got a weird unicode error:

(Pdb) data_train[0]
*** UnicodeEncodeError: 'latin-1' codec can't encode character '\u22f1' in position 210: ordinal not in range(256)

only after I casted to numpy() did it print correctly. Shouldn't it be printing the floatTensor easily?

To reproduce the code just loop through cifar10 with trainloader and print the x feature pixels:

        for i,data_train in enumerate(trainloader):
              print(data_train[0]) # BUG
